mapper.insert: insert into up_aiInfo (up_aicode, up_aiappraise, up_aistatus, up_usercode, up_aitimes, up_aicreatetime, up_aiexecutetime, up_aipersontime, up_aitaskid, up_aiphone, extra1, extra2, extra3, extra4, extra5 ) values (#{upAicode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAiappraise,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upAistatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUsercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAitimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upAicreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAiexecutetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAipersontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upAitaskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upAiphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into up_aiInfo
up_aicode,
up_aiappraise,
up_aistatus,
up_usercode,
up_aitimes,
up_aicreatetime,
up_aiexecutetime,
up_aipersontime,
up_aitaskid,
up_aiphone,
extra1,
extra2,
extra3,
extra4,
extra5,

#{upAiappraise,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{upAistatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{upUsercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{upAitimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{extra4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{extra5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select up_aicode,up_aiphone from up_aiInfo where up_usercode = #{userId} and up_aistatus = '1'
